Desc.entry: Offers a day rehabilitation service for the elderly, with a specialist focus on the treatment of stroke, Parkinson's Disease and falls. Younger people with these specific conditions are also accepted. Transport, if needed is available in the south of the city. Referrals can be made by any health or social care worker, or informal enquiries can be made directly to the unit.

Langs.entry: British Sign Language, Others by arrangement
